definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sling, hurl forth (Thes cp. Ar. qali9a sit insecurely (v. also Frä:224, Socin in Buhl Lex 13), waver, whence qil9un sail (loan-wd. Frä:1. c.), JAram. [[קַלְעָא]] id., BH NH [[קֶלַע]] curtain; thence hurl, sling; but this perh. denom. (Socin:l. c.) fr. qula09ah;un loosened clod, cf. Syr.quwlo9o0 id. (Nö in Frä:l. c.); Ar. miqla9un sling, Eth maql9:: id.; Targum [[קְלַע]] vb. sling, Syr. n. qel9o0 sling);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[קׂלֵעַ בָּאֶבֶן אֶל־]] Ju Jdg 20:16 one slinging  (with) a stone at a hair; ´[[קוֹ]]: c. acc. pers. Je 10:18 I will sling forth the inhabitants.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִקַלַּע]] 1Sa 17:49 and he slang (sc. the stone); sf. [[יְקַלְּעֶנׇּה]] 1Sa 25:29 he shall sling away (life of enemy).
